headline: Conagra Brands, Inc. (CAG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Conagra Brands, Inc. on Aklan Investment Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CAG. Conagra Brands, Inc.’s share was trading at $19.55 as of February 5th. CAG’s trailing and forward P/E were 10.84 and 10.96 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Conagra Brands, Inc. (CAG) is a U.S.-based packaged food company with a diversified portfolio spanning Grocery & Snacks, Refrigerated & Frozen, International, and Foodservice. It
